#id=1
#text=Last night , I made a grocery list and went shopping .
#id=2
#text=To make a list , I go through my cabinets and refrigerator and write down things that I am out of .
#id=3
#text=These are always the same things like coffee and milk .
#id=4
#text=Then I thought of some recipes I wanted to make .
#id=5
#text=I wrote down pasta shells , ricotta cheese , Parmesan cheese , spinach , and tomato sauce .
#id=6
#text=I am going to make stuffed shells this week !
#id=7
#text=When I got to the store , I got my reusable bags out of the car .
#id=8
#text=Using no plastic bags is a great way to help the environment .
#id=9
#text=Since I went to the store around 8 p.m. , it was n't very crowded .
#text=I could relax as I moved my way from produce , dry goods , and then dairy .
#text=I saw a huge display of Easter candy because it is March and the holiday is coming up .
#text=I was so tempted to buy a lot of chocolate but I did n't .
#text=I only try to get treats once in awhile .
#text=Finally , I went to the front check out .
#text=The cashier was nice and the bagger was happy to use my own bags .
#text=I got home and put everything away .
#text=Now I ca n't wait to make my stuffed shells for dinner !
